columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the vault.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a vault uniquely.

columns.name: vault_uri
columns.description: Contains URI of the vault for performing operations on keys and secrets.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource.

columns.name: create_mode
columns.description: The vault's create mode to indicate whether the vault need to be recovered or not. Possible values include: 'default', 'recover'.

columns.name: enabled_for_deployment
columns.description: Indicates whether Azure Virtual Machines are permitted to retrieve certificates stored as secrets from the key vault.

columns.name: enabled_for_disk_encryption
columns.description: Indicates whether Azure Disk Encryption is permitted to retrieve secrets from the vault and unwrap keys.

columns.name: enabled_for_template_deployment
columns.description: Indicates whether Azure Resource Manager is permitted to retrieve secrets from the key vault.

columns.name: enable_rbac_authorization
columns.description: Property that controls how data actions are authorized.

columns.name: purge_protection_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether protection against purge is enabled for this vault.

columns.name: soft_delete_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the 'soft delete' functionality is enabled for this key vault.

columns.name: soft_delete_retention_in_days
columns.description: Contains softDelete data retention days.

columns.name: sku_family
columns.description: Contains SKU family name.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: SKU name to specify whether the key vault is a standard vault or a premium vault.

columns.name: tenant_id
columns.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID that should be used for authenticating requests to the key vault.

columns.name: access_policies
columns.description: A list of 0 to 1024 identities that have access to the key vault.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the vault.

columns.name: network_acls
columns.description: Rules governing the accessibility of the key vault from specific network locations.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the key vault.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
